name: Pirate Plunder!
description:
Arrrrr Cursed Captain! 

Put down ye rum and start giving orders to ye cursed crew! 

Our plundering is in danger, shoot down the ships and earn ye crews loyalty! 

Win condition

The more ships you shoot down, the higher the score! Comment below to brag of ye score!

Lose condition

If the treasure chest is destroyed (3 hits), ye plunder is lost, and you might as well let the kraken eat ye...

Commands:

  1. Spawn Cursed Pirates - Put them to work the cannons!
  2. Fire the cannons - Only works if you have set ye crew on them!
  3. Repair the walls - Stop drinking and repair the walls!

Quickly switch between orders by using the arrow keys, and execute your command with spacebar.

By Pontus Jakobsson, Jari Hanski, & Amanda Backlund
